entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 6:18 PM AST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
